name: POLICY_VAR_REPO_PROTECTED_BRANCH_PATTERNS
description: Protect important branches using a regex pattern. ADOProjectPolicyConfiguration - Settings.BranchRefNames property.

name: POLICY_VAR_REPO_DEFAULT_BRANCH_PATTERNS
description: The default branch name regex pattern. ADOProjectGitRepository - DefaultBranch property.

name: POLICY_VAR_REPO_COMMIT_AUTHOR_EMAIL_PATTERNS
description: Block pushes from including commits where the author email does not match the specified regex patterns. ADOProjectPolicyConfiguration - Settings.CommitAuthorEmailPatterns property.
